name: SPACE SHOOTER (itch) (konakuma)
description:
A very generic space shooter.

All assets, music, and sound effects made by me.

Basically just another test at what I can do

Features:
3 power-ups (Speed Boost, Shield, Triple Shot)
Enemies that fire
Score

Controls: ESC= quit
WASD= move
SPACE= shoot

This game is super super easy

if you want to support me at all, please do so at ko-fi.com/konakuma - Ko-fi ❤️ 

Working on building an Android version (OK emoji)
(Screenshots taken and cropped from the Android build)
